name: 2022 International Conference on Computer Engineering, Technologies and Applications
content: Publication: Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees. The accepted paper will be included into CETA 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Scopus & EI Compendex, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
